text: muṉ tiṉam avaṉuṭaiya (celva) nilaiyai virumpiyavarkaḷellām, "āccariyam tāṉ! Allāh taṉ aṭiyārkaḷil, tāṉ nāṭiyavarkaḷukku ākāra vacatikaḷaip perukkukiṟāṉ, curukkiyum viṭukiṟāṉ; allāh namakku kirupai ceyyavillaiyāyiṉ avaṉ nam'maiyum (pūmiyil) aḻuntac ceytiruppāṉ; āccariyam tāṉ! Niccayamāka kāḥpirkaḷ cittiyaṭaiya māṭṭārkaḷ" eṉṟu kūṟiṉārkaḷ
